img_above_text:
![Wukong Karma 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b1/Wukong_Karma_8.jpg)
Back at the Towers of Karma Shrine, look ahead to find a large series of statues carved into a wall with a new enemy standing in front of them. This fearsome foe is a Dual-Blade Monk, and has a lot of health and damaging moves (but thankfully won't respawn).
img_below_text:
Be ready for him to toss his blades at you as they boomerang back to him, and then dart up close to attack low with sweeping cuts from his blades. Though he can perform long combos that end in powerful uppercuts, he's not immune to being greatly staggered from a well time Rock Solid, so wait for a good moment to upset his attacks and punish him.
![Wukong Karma 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cf/Wukong_Karma_10.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 82 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:

Back at the Towers of Karma Shrine, look ahead to find a large series of statues carved into a wall with a new enemy standing in front of them. This fearsome foe is a Dual-Blade Monk, and has a lot of health and damaging moves (but thankfully won't respawn)."
            - Following Text: "Be ready for him to toss his blades at you as they boomerang back to him, and then dart up close to attack low with sweeping cuts from his blades. Though he can perform long combos that end in powerful uppercuts, he's not immune to being greatly staggered from a well time Rock Solid, so wait for a good moment to upset his attacks and punish him.
![Wukong Karma 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cf/Wukong_Karma_10.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts an intense battle scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the protagonist is engaged in combat with the Dual-Blade Monk enemy. The monk is performing a powerful attack, showcasing his dual blades and combat prowess. The preceding and following text provide context on the monk's abilities, including his boomerang blade throw and sweeping cuts, and suggest strategies for defeating him, such as using the Rock Solid move to stagger his attacks.
